      # layout

      ‰ΩøÁî®flexÂ∏ÉÂ±ÄÔºårem‰∏∫Âçï‰ΩçÔºå‰∏çÊîØÊåÅie10‰ª•‰∏ãÊµèËßàÂô®

      # Responsive

      ‰ΩøÁî®Number‰º†ÂÖ•props

      <ui-row>
  <ui-col :xs="6" :sm="10" :md="8" :lg="4">
    <div class="box"></div>
  </ui-col>
  <ui-col :xs="6" :sm="2" :md="4" :lg="8">
    <div class="box"></div>
  </ui-col>
</ui-row>
<ui-row>
  <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="2">
    <div class="box"></div>
  </ui-col>
  <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="3">
    <div class="box"></div>
  </ui-col>
  <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="4">
    <div class="box"></div>
  </ui-col>
  <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="6" :md="3" :lg="3">
    <div class="box"></div>
  </ui-col>
</ui-row>
      breakpoint size
      xs 30em
      sm 48em
      md 64em
      lg 75em
      xlg 96em

      # Responsive by percertage

      <ui-row>
 <ui-col :basis="50">
   <div class="box">50</div>
 </ui-col>
 <ui-col :basis="40">
   <div class="box">40</div>
 </ui-col>
 <ui-col :basis="10">
   <div class="box">10</div>
 </ui-col>
</ui-row>

      # Offset

          <ui-row>
      <ui-col :xs-offset="10" :xs="2">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
    </ui-row>
    <ui-row>
      <ui-col :xs-offset="8" :xs="4">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
    </ui-row>
    <ui-row>
      <ui-col :xs-offset="6" :xs="6">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
    </ui-row>

      # Gutter

      gutter unit is rem

      <ui-row :gutter="2">
      <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="2">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
      <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="3">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
      <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="4">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
      <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="6" :md="3" :lg="3">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
    </ui-row>
    <ui-row :gutter="1">
      <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="2">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
      <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="3">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
      <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="2" :md="3" :lg="4">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
      <ui-col :xs="3" :sm="6" :md="3" :lg="3">
        <div class="box"></div>
      </ui-col>
    </ui-row>

      # space between ÊúÄÂêé‰∏Ä‰∏™itemÂØπÈΩêÊñπÂºè

      Flex-box: Align last row to grid

      .grid {
  display: flex;
  flex-flow: row wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

.grid::after {
  content: "";
  flex: auto;
}

      # Âõ∫ÂÆöÂÆΩÂ∫¶ space between,‰∏çÈÄÇÁî®ui-col

      .list {
  &::after {
    content: "";
    @include lg {
      width: 300px; // itemÂÆΩÂ∫¶
    }

    @include md {
      width: 300px;
    }
  }
  @include xs{
    justify-content: center;
  }
  @include sm{
    justify-content: space-between;
  }
}
